title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: First law optimization, availability, Exergy analysis. Second law optimization of thermal systems. Energy audits and conservation programme, elements of energy accounting. Plant energy studies: concepts, resources, procedures and implementation. Energy accounting indices, energy budget and variance analysisstatistical and engineering models. Economic aspects, payback. Analysis: energy intensive industries, low consumption industries, e.g. fabrication shops, renewable energy systems.
